title: 1.9服务端开服问题
txt_content:
Loading libraries, please wait...
[18:08:29 INFO]: Starting minecraft server version 1.9
[18:08:29 INFO]: Loading properties
[18:08:29 INFO]: Default game type: SURVIVAL
[18:08:29 INFO]: This server is running CraftBukkit version git-Spigot-ee4e41a-3
879b98 (MC: 1.9) (Implementing API version 1.9-R0.1-SNAPSHOT)
[18:08:30 INFO]: Debug logging is disabled
[18:08:30 INFO]: Server Ping Player Sample Count: 12
[18:08:30 INFO]: Using 4 threads for Netty based IO
[18:08:30 INFO]: Generating keypair
[18:08:30 INFO]: Starting Minecraft server on 180.154.77.219:25565
[18:08:30 INFO]: Using default channel type
[18:08:30 WARN]: **** FAILED TO BIND TO PORT!
[18:08:30 WARN]: The exception was: java.net.BindException: Cannot assign reques
ted address: bind
[18:08:30 WARN]: Perhaps a server is already running on that port?
[18:08:30 INFO]: Stopping server
[18:08:30 INFO]: Saving players
一直这样 求解！！！！！！！！！！！！！！  我用的是1.9spigot服务端

replies.author: 晓肖
replies.txt_content:
端口占用
将
server.pro里面的
server-port=25562
改成其他端口即可
提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: yellow_Gay
replies.txt_content:
端口已经被占用 
在server-port=修改为 25500
